mission: To empower small and marginal farmers through collective farming, marketing, and capacity building initiatives that enhance their income and improve their quality of life.
vision: To become the leading farmer producer company in West Bengal, creating sustainable agricultural ecosystems and prosperous farming communities.
story: Founded in 2020, Masters Farmers Producer Company Limited (MFPCL) emerged from the collective vision of progressive farmers in Purulia district. Our journey began with a simple belief - that farmers, when united, can achieve remarkable success.
objectives: Provide quality inputs at affordable prices
Ensure fair market prices for farm produce
Offer training and capacity building programs
Facilitate access to credit and insurance
